long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that provides quality of life improvements to our workflow.

Things it does so far:
Add the tests status check to the main PR description.

Allow the set up of most used base branches:
  - For easier branch comparisons when creating PR's.
  - For porting directly from one PR to another base branch.
Add a button in the PR description to immediately run the tests.

DB Schema:
- Button to create linked Goodxweb PR with migration number changed to newest on the DB schema PR.
- Button to automatically bump migrations on a PR to newest available numbers.
 This will also update the .dbversion file on the linked Goodxweb PR, if there is one.
